participant_1.name: Larry
participant_1.personality: Friendly and passionate, Larry enjoys sharing his love for cooking and fishing with others.
participant_1.background: i love cooking but i also enjoy fishing. l also love comic books. hey my name is larry and i am a chef. if i'm not cooking in the kitchen then i'm definitely on the water.
